Empezando

Vamos a habilitar los colores de las cajas con el

Class: c-black
Hex: #292929
Class: c-white
Hex: #ffffff
Class: c-error
Hex: #f54637
Class: c-dark-grey
Hex: #8e8e8e
Class: c-middle-grey
Hex: #e3e3e3
Class: c-light-grey
Hex: #f0f0f0
Class: c-info
Hex: #1a32a4
Class: c-green
Hex: #76ae4A
Class: c-yellow
Hex: #ffc700

.c-black:#292929;
.c-white:#ffffff;
.c-error:#f54637;
.c-dark-grey:#8e8e8e;
.c-middle-grey:#e3e3e3;
.c-light-grey:#f0f0f0;
.c-info:#1a32a4;
.c-green:#76ae4A;
.c-yellow:#ffc700;
